title: Victory Day for World War II, 2025
summary: The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump, commemorating May 8, 2025, as Victory Day for World War II, marking the 80th anniversary of the Allied victory over fascism in Europe. It emphasizes the sacrifices made by over 250,000 American soldiers during the war and honors those who lost their lives for freedom and Western civilization. The proclamation reflects on the significance of the Allied victory and the importance of pursuing peace through strength, while also expressing a commitment to end endless foreign wars. Ultimately, it serves as a tribute to the Greatest Generation and reaffirms the United States' dedication to ensuring safety, security, and liberty for all.
